You Got a Job in Channel Management—Now What?
She is a mother of 4, sole breadwinner and closes deals in 30 days.
She is JoDean Gingerich, Sales Professional on Swarmsales, Inc

Alex Limeres and I  had a chance to catch up with JoDean when she stopped by our offices. JoDean shared her journey on our marketplace and discussed how quickly she was able to start monetizing her relationships.
JoDean isn’t an account on our marketplace, she is an individual journey. We couldn't be more excited to be working with her.
Does your partner portal hinder partners or empower them?
Allbound replaces partner portals and PRM with a smart SaaS platform that guides partners to more closed deals and renewals.
IDS Technology Marketing is a business-to-business (B2B) marketing, lead generation and sales enablement whose mission is to help technology companies succeed.

BMA Phoenix is the Valley's only association devoted exclusively to excellence in business-to-business (B2B) marketing. The goal of our board to provide world-class access to industry resources, discourse and education, and networking to help B2B marketers meet the unique challenges of their everyday working world with the primary goal of maximizing their business marketing expertise and growing professionally.
Arizona Technology Council - Startup and Entrepreneurship Committee

As chair of the AZ Tech Council's Startup and Entrepreneurship committee, it was our goal to continue to building the region's economy and technology industry by supporting early-stage business growth and by connecting local startups and entrepreneurs with mentors and corporations who can help guide them towards growth and success.In 2013, the committee developed and hosted the state's first ever StartupConnect AZ Conference, bringing together 350+ of the state's top business and community leaders for education and networking on topics related to the growth of the state's entrepreneurship and startup ecosystem.

summary: Scott Salkin is the Founder and CEO of Allbound, a next generation platform that helps companies accelerate revenue through their channel partner programs by replacing portals and PRM with a smart SaaS solution that guides partners to more closed deals and renewals.Scott’s high-tech career started at the nonprofit San Diego Regional Technology Alliance (SDRTA), providing technology equipment and training to underprivileged communities throughout the region. His next stops were at Cisco Systems and NetPro Computing (now Dell Software), before launching his first startup, IDS Technology Marketing, in 2007.Scott has been listed by the Arizona Republic as one if its “Top 35 Entrepreneurs Under 35," as one of the Phoenix Business Journal’s “40 Under 40” and was featured as one of AZ Business Magazine’s "Generation Next Business Leaders.” He was honored as the Phoenix Business Journal and Business Marketing Association (BMA) Marketer of the Year as as a finalist for Arizona's Tech CEO of the Year.Scott also served as board president for the Phoenix chapter of the Business Marketing Association (BMA), as Chairman for the Arizona Technology Council’s Startup and Entrepreneurship Committee, and as a board member for Playworks Arizona and for the Arizona Technology Council Foundation.
name: Scott Salkin
title: Turning channel sales & marketing on its head...and ticking-off a few traditionalists along the way. #NeverSellAlone
